You know that I treat you differently from anyone else.

what Yu and Concubine Beauté did.

I'm afraid you'll have to settle for it at the moment.

Huan Huan cares nothing about her rank.

column6: As long as you have me in your heart, Si Lang.
I always do.

column6: I hold you very dear to my heart.

只有在你这里才能惬意
column6:
I could only have peace of mind
here with you in the entire harem.
I understand.

You visited Meizhuang.
Does she have a better appetite now?

column6:
She's still the same, craving for sour food.

column6: When will you have a baby boy of our own?

column6:
Why does it have to be a boy?
Why not a girl?

column6: I'll love our child just the same.

column6:
Peace to Your Majesty.
Peace to Lady Sourire.
Rise.

column6: I thank Your Majesty.
Where are you heading to, Lingrong?

How coincidental!
His Majesty is going with me too.

- Let's go together.
- Yes.

column6: Let's go.

column6:

I believe you'll give birth to a healthy child.
His Majesty the Emperor.
May peace be with Your Majesty.

column6:
What a coincidence!
Everyone is here today.

the best care for her as the head of the harem.
We follow Her Majesty.

Here, sit down.

column6: How are you? How are you feeling today?

column6: I'm very well. I thank Your Majesty.

He cooks the best Jiangnan cuisine.

column6:

a good cook as well to keep Your Majesty for dinner.

His Majesty always remembers the
ejiao longan soup at Your Highness's palace.

column3: 如今宫中又来了个好厨子
column6: [from the night when Meizhuang almost drowned]

His Majesty would even visit Your Highness in his dreams.

Are you going to wage a war of words with her?

column6:
Your Majesty, I always like to banter with
Lady Sourire for her sharpness of wit.

column6: It's all right. I'll visit the Empress.
If you have cantaloupe, I'll eat with you later.
Sure.

Yes.

column6:

- Come here!

What is it that you are carrying?
What is this?

Take her out!
My Lady...

bring the prescription in the

I would never expect you to
commit such an unspeakable crime
trying to gain favor with a feigned pregnancy.
I feel extremely disappointed.

I am wrongfully convicted.

kill.

Go quickly ...
this ...
burn this immediately!

Count it before you go.
(sigh) I'm afraid this could only last for six months for me.

I've sent people in pursuit.

Yes.
Your Highness.
Rise.

Very well.

even if she had to die to make it successful.

Mr Zhang!
Peace to Companion An.

column6: Mr Zhang! Mr Zhang!

when the rats are caught in the palace.
